title: CSmock
description: FullStack project for tech learners, can book online meetings with experts, post and find Jobs, have discussions, get tech news and chat support.

title: nextMEET
description: This project replicates Zoom, a widely used video conferencing tool. It enables users to securely log in, create meetings and access various meeting functionalities.

title: Videotube-Backend
description: This is a Backend Project for the video sharing app similar to youtube where users can share video, can have subsribers, like and comment on videos etc.

title: PlayMe
description: This is a music player web app.This app has features like search, play, pause, jump to next and previous music with progress bar alongwith that, one can tune volume also.
